sentence.Network_en: There are reports of widespread dis-content in the capital.

sentence.Network_cn: 对录像片内容实行了更为严格的监管。

sentence.Network_en: Not content with rescuing one theatre, Sally Green has taken on another.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨莉·格林不满足于挽救一家剧院，她又接手了另外一家。

jx.jx_en_mean: to the full extent of one's desires

lj.lj_ly: the children could run and play to their heart's content.
lj.lj_ls: 孩子们能尽情奔跑玩耍。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin contentus 'satisfied', past participle of continere (see contain)
late Middle English: from medieval Latin contentum (plural contenta 'things contained'), neuter past participle of continere (see contain)

encyclopedia.content: 简介解释 形容词a. 1.满足的，满意的；甘愿的[F][(+with)][+to-v] She seemsto live with him. 她似乎很满意与他生活在一起。 He waswith his work. 他对自己的工作很满意。 He seemed 他好像满足了。 及物动词 1. 使满足[(+with)] Her answer seemed to him. 她的回答好像令他满意。延伸 n.内容；（书等的）目录；满足；容量 [kənˈtent] adj.满足的， 满意的；愿意的；心甘情愿的 vt.使满足， 使满意

entry.tran: 所容纳的东西;所含之物
entry.def: The contents of a container such as a bottle, box, or room are the things that are inside it.

example.ex: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve...
example.tran: 将锅里的东西倒到筛子上。

example.ex: I emptied the contents of the fridge into carrier bags...
example.tran: 我把冰箱里的东西全都腾到手提袋里。

entry.def: If you refer to the content or contents of something such as a book, speech, or television programme, you are referring to the subject that it deals with, the story that it tells, or the ideas that it expresses.

example.ex: She is reluctant to discuss the content of the play...
example.tran: 她不愿意谈该剧的内容。

example.ex: Stricter controls were placed on the content of video films...
example.tran: 对录像片内容实行了更为严格的监管。

entry.def: The contents of a book are its different chapters and sections, usually shown in a list at the beginning of the book.

example.ex: There is no initial list of contents.

entry.def: The content of something such as an educational course or a programme of action is the elements that it consists of.

example.ex: Previous students have had nothing but praise for the course content and staff...
example.tran: 往届学生对课程内容与教员全是赞扬之词。

example.ex: This is how we see our tasks, and the substance and content of our work for the forthcoming period.
example.tran: 这就是我们对工作任务的看法，以及下一阶段我们工作的实质与内容。

entry.def: You can use content to refer to the amount or proportion of something that a substance contains.

example.ex: Sunflower margarine has the same fat content as butter...
example.tran: 向日葵所制人造黄油的脂肪含量与黄油脂肪含量相同。

example.ex: He was astonished at the high gold content in the 340 million-year-old rock.
example.tran: 他对这块有3.4亿年历史的岩石的高含金量大为惊异。

entry.def: If you are content with something, you are willing to accept it, rather than wanting something more or something better.

example.ex: I am content to admire the mountains from below...
example.tran: 我满足于从山脚下观赏山景。

example.ex: I'm perfectly content with the way the campaign has gone...
example.tran: 我对竞选活动的进展十分满意。

entry.def: If you are content, you are fairly happy or satisfied.

example.ex: He says his daughter is quite content.

entry.def: If you content yourself with something, you accept it and do not try to do or have other things.

example.ex: He wisely contented himself with his family and his love of nature...
example.tran: 他非常明智，拥有家庭和对自然的热爱便知足了。

example.ex: Most manufacturers content themselves with updating existing models.
example.tran: 大多数制造商都满足于对现有款型进行更新。

means.word_mean: 1. everything that is included in a collection;

sentences.sentence: "he emptied the contents of his pockets"
"the two groups were similar in content"

means.word_mean: 2. what a communication that is about something is about
3. the proportion of a substance that is contained in a mixture or alloy etc.
4. the amount that can be contained;

sentences.sentence: "the gas tank has a capacity of 12 gallons"

means.word_mean: 5. the sum or range of what has been perceived, discovered, or learned
6. the state of being contented with your situation in life;

sentences.sentence: "they could read to their heart's content"

means.word_mean: 7. something (a person or object or scene) selected by an artist or photographer for graphic representation;

sentences.sentence: "a moving picture of a train is more dramatic than a still picture of the same subject"
"He contented himself with one glass of beer per day"

means.word_mean: 1. satisfied or showing satisfaction with things as they are;

auth_sentence.content: Abdul Kadar was content to play a waiting game.
auth_sentence.res_content: Abdul Kadar was content to play a waiting game.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Abdul Kadar was content to play a waiting game.

auth_sentence.content: There are no reports of widespread filtering of content.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are no reports of widespread filtering of content.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are no reports of widespread filtering of content.

auth_sentence.content: This applies to all BBC content on any platform.
auth_sentence.res_content: This applies to all BBC content on any platform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This applies to all BBC content on any platform.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

ten拿住,握住,支撑+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站不住脚的,防守不住的

con全部+ten拿住,握住,支撑+t→全部拿住→容量,内容;满足的
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
dis不+content满足的→n.不满,不满足 adj.不满的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,保持,生活费用
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man手+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→用手拿住→维修,坚持
sus下面+ten支撑+ance表名词→支撑下去的东西→粮食;坚持
ten拿住,握住,支撑+acity表名词→tenacious名词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 租赁期限;租佃,租用,租赁

ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ure表名词→拿住状态
coun=con+ten拿住,握住,支撑+ance表名词→全部控制→容忍,表示不提意见,同意
fas+ten拿住,握住,支撑→v.[使]固定，系牢，绑紧，扣紧
ten拿住,握住,支撑+ant人→拿[钱]租房之人

Sentence.sentence: But they have a powerful hold on many people nonetheless, a hold extending far beyond their literary content.
He calls Inkling a platform for publishers to build rich multimedia content from the ground up, with a heavy emphasis on real-world functionality.
But with Inkling, you can highlight a piece of content and make notes
To discuss the content of a project report.
In the 1930s,when only one in 10 Americans had a degree from a four-year college, an admissions committee was content to ask for a sample of applicants'chool papers to assess their writing ability
He had also planned the content of his speech to focus on the teams with the best records, the ones that had won the most games in the last season

means.word_mean: 所容纳之物, 所含之物

sentences.en: The police emptied her bag and examined the contents.
sentences.cn: 警察倒出她包中的东西检查。

sentences.en: In my opinion the movie lacks contents.
sentences.cn: 依我看, 这部电影缺乏实质性内容。

sentences.en: No other food has so high an iron content.
sentences.cn: 没有别的食物有这么高的含铁量。

sentences.en: Now that she has apologized, I am content.
sentences.cn: 既然她已经道了歉, 我也就满意了。

sentences.en: He was content that the thing had happened.
sentences.cn: 这事终于发生, 对此他是满意的。

sentences.en: The cat lay stretched out beside the fire in sleepy content.
sentences.cn: 那只猫伸展四肢躺在炉边睡得很满足。

means.word_mean: 使满足, 使满意 [content oneself]

sentences.en: Simple praise is enough to content him.
sentences.cn: 简单的称赞就能使他满足了。

sentences.en: You have to content yourself with what you have.

jushi.english: The content of your essay is excellent, but it's not very well expressed.
jushi.chinese: 你那篇文章的内容好极了,但是表达方式不太好。

jushi.english: We artists should combine healthy political content with finished artistic forms.
jushi.chinese: 我们艺术家们应该把健康的政治内容和完美的艺术形式结合起来。

jushi.english: The drawer had been emptied of its contents.
